name: Really Real Arcade Game Creepypasta Game.EXE (Kiloken)
name_original: Really Real Arcade Game Creepypasta Game.EXE (Kiloken)
description:
This is a Game Jam Game made by a friend and myself about a year ago now. I wanted to reupload it on my own page in order to start building a portfolio of sorts as the head programmer. Just a head's up, the music gets loud and obnoxious, so make sure the computer is a little more quiet if you want sound. This is a parody game. 

Programmer: Wyatt Landers (Myself)

Art/Music: Thomas Martin 

Original version uploaded by artist at https://camcato.itch.io/really-real-arcade-game-creepypasta
